title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
EB: The software should retain the maximized state of the CVS repository view when switching perspectives.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Come back to the Java perspective.
